0101101010100110 0100010001001110 0 -> sum: 1001111011110100, cout: 0
0110111100001100 0001011001100011 0 -> sum: 1000010101101111, cout: 0

1101011111010010 0101111000000011 1 -> sum: 0011010111010110, cout: 1

1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
